string-array.name: randremind_release_notes
string-array.item: First 2.0.0 Alpha release. Lots of new features and only some of them work.
Rebranding "Donation" to "Pro". All previously free features remain free.
Overhauled the help and feedback page.
Lots of new reminder settings. Changed how repeat is handled. Most of the new settings do not work yet.
Added a new built in ringtone picker so it follows the app theme. Disable in settings to use an external ringtone picker.
Customize the app theme with the main Light or Dark theme and change the primary and accent colors (16+ available options).
